name: part_012
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね誕生日2023 】3D LIVE✨毎日誰かの誕生日！重大発表あり！【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ ホロライブ 】 [Y_n8tWcMFj8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Nene continues her performance of "Love Destiny".
MC section where Nene talks with Maidon-sensei after the performance.
Nene goes to change her costume and moves to the center stage while interacting with the audience.

subtitles.original: Love Love Love 会いたい
subtitles.english: Love, love, love, I want to see you

subtitles.original: だけど会えない
subtitles.english: But I can't see you

subtitles.original: もう戻れはしない
subtitles.english: I can't go back anymore

subtitles.original: これが最後の真実
subtitles.english: This is the final truth

subtitles.original: あー、来てもらいました、まいどん先生！
subtitles.english: Oh, we have Maidon-sensei here!

subtitles.original: どうどうどう？ギリギリ大丈夫？
subtitles.english: How was it? Was it barely okay?

subtitles.original: いや本当もう、感想何もわかんなかった
subtitles.english: Honestly, I had no idea how it went.

subtitles.original: オリジナルがね、こうね、いっぱいあってぐちゃぐちゃになっちゃっててね
subtitles.english: The original choreography... there were so many parts that it all got mixed up.

subtitles.original: みんなが勝手から「オラ！」ってすごい書いてくるからさ、ちょっと笑っちゃった
subtitles.english: Everyone was typing "Ora!" so much in the chat that I couldn't help but laugh.

subtitles.original: でも、まいどん先生がニコニコ笑顔なの見えてて
subtitles.english: But I could see Maidon-sensei smiling.

subtitles.original: 何点？100点満点中なら？
subtitles.english: How many points? Out of 100?

subtitles.original: 可愛いから100点！
subtitles.english: 100 points because you're cute!

subtitles.original: やったー！これからもよろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: Yay! I look forward to working with you.

subtitles.original: というわけで、まいどん星からやってきたおでんガールズのまいどん先生でした！
subtitles.english: And so, that was Maidon-sensei from the Oden Girls who came from Planet Maidon!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! Good luck!

subtitles.original: はい、というわけで、ねねも次の曲に向けてちょっとお着替えしていきたいと思いますので
subtitles.english: All right, so Nene is going to change for the next song...

subtitles.original: 一旦、はけます！オッオッオッオッオッ...
subtitles.english: So I'll step out for a moment! Ho-ho-ho-ho...

subtitles.original: じゃーん！いぇーい！見てみんな！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Yay! Look everyone!

subtitles.original: こないだの4thフェスの時にお披露目したばかりのブライト衣装になります！
subtitles.english: This is the Bright costume that was just unveiled at the 4th Fes!

subtitles.original: この服を着て、次はちょっとここの先、実はステージがありまして
subtitles.english: Wearing this outfit, next, there's actually a stage further ahead...

subtitles.original: そこをびーんと前に行って歌っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: And I'm going to go right out there and sing!

subtitles.original: テッテッテ、うわー見て見て、根っ子花道！そして、これはなんだ！？べーん！
subtitles.english: Step by step... Wow, look, it's a "Nekko" runway! And what's this? Ta-da!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！わー！うわー！はいどうも、ハイタッチどうもどうも
subtitles.english: Yay! Wow! Whoa! Hello, high-fives, hello, hello.

subtitles.original: いつも応援ありがとうございます、桃鈴ねねでございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you always for your support, I am Momosuzu Nene!

subtitles.original: というわけで、真ん中のステージでも一曲聴いていただきたいと思います
subtitles.english: And so, I'd like you to listen to one song from the center stage.

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください、一番の宝物
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to "Ichiban no Takaramono".

subtitles.original: 裾が濡れたなら
subtitles.english: If the hem gets wet

subtitles.original: 乾くの待てばいい
subtitles.english: I just have to wait for it to dry

subtitles.original: 水音を立てて跳ねた
subtitles.english: Splashing with the sound of water

subtitles.original: 君が教えてくれたんだ
subtitles.english: You were the one who taught me

subtitles.original: もう怖くない
subtitles.english: I'm not afraid anymore

subtitles.original: 握っていてくれた
subtitles.english: You held on to me

subtitles.original: この手を離さなきゃだめだ
subtitles.english: I have to let go of this hand

subtitles.original: ひとりでもゆくよ
subtitles.english: I'll go, even if I'm alone

subtitles.original: たとえ辛くても
subtitles.english: Even if it's painful

subtitles.original: みんなで見た夢は
subtitles.english: The dream we saw together

subtitles.original: 必ず持ってくよ
subtitles.english: I'll definitely take it with me

subtitles.original: みんなとがいいな
subtitles.english: I want to be with everyone

subtitles.original: みんなとがよかった
subtitles.english: It was good to be with everyone

subtitles.original: でも目覚めた朝
subtitles.english: But on the morning I woke up

subtitles.original: 誰も居ないんだね
subtitles.english: No one was there
